requests.title: Minimal request (name only)
requests.description: Creates a new pet with just the required name field.

requests.title: Full request (name and tag)
requests.description: Creates a new pet with a name and an optional tag for categorization.

success.title: Pet created successfully (minimal)
success.description: The store assigns a unique integer ID to the newly created pet and returns the full pet object.

success.title: Pet created successfully (with tag)
success.description: When a tag is provided, it is persisted alongside the name and returned in the response.

errors.title: Missing required field (name)
errors.description: The name field is required. Omitting it produces a validation error.

response_body.message: Validation failed: 'name' is a required property

errors.title: Invalid JSON in request body
errors.description: Sending malformed JSON results in a parse error.

response_body.message: Bad request: request body is not valid JSON

errors.title: Internal server error
errors.description: An unexpected server-side failure prevents the pet from being created.

response_body.message: Internal server error: unable to persist pet record
